name: Tapes N Shapes (WestMac Games)
description:
Rewind the tapes and place the shapes. A short, relaxing puzzle game.

Features:

  • Interesting Puzzles
  • Relaxing Music
  • Casual Atmosphere

Quite short. Expect a 5 - 15 minute experience at most.

Created by:

  • Weston McNamara - Programming
  • Jonathan Baer - Music
  • Anna Wienburg - Art

Submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2
